allOf.title: CertificateLanguages
allOf.description: For a JSON document one or two translations used in the rendering of HTML and PDF documents can be specificed.

CageCode.description: The Commercial and Government Entity Code (short CAG), is a unique identifier assigned to suppliers to various government or defense agencies, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commercial_and_Government_Entity_code

Country.description: The two-letter ISO country code according https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2.

AdditionalInformation.description: An array of additional free text information on the company.

allOf.title: ChemicalElement
allOf.description: The chemical composition of the product.

Actual.description: The measured part of the element in percentage.

Minimum.description: The minimum if defined by the product specification, otherwise the element must not provided.

Maximum.description: The maximum as defined by the product specification, otherwise the element must not provided.

allOf.title: Measurement
allOf.description: Measured Values in a structured fashion for easy processing and rendering of data

Value.description: A measured or calculated Value (e.g. mean of individual measurements).

Minimum.description: The lower limit according product specification. If not provided it is 0.

Maximum.description: The upper limit according product specification. If not provided it is âˆž.

B04.description: The delivery conditions for the product

B07.description: Identification of the product, usually batch, charge or lot number

B08.description: Number of pieces of the product.

B09.description: Product type and its describing dimensional parameters

B10.description: Product dimensions - length of the product

CE_Image.description: The CE image as base64 encoded png file. A default with size 90x65 is provided by example

NotifiedBodyNumber.description: The identification number of the Notified body. Refer to https://eur-lex.europa.eu/LexUriServ/LexUriServ.do?uri=CELEX:31993L0068:en:HTML and https://ec.europa.eu/growth/tools-databases/nando/index.cfm?fuseaction=notifiedbody.main

DoCYear.description: The year when the declaration of conformance was issued

DoCNumber.description: The declaration of conformance document number

A97.description: A custom field for the position number in the order

A98.description: A custom field for the delivery note number

A99.description: A custom field for the aviso document number

allOf.title: CommercialTransaction
allOf.description: List parties and details involved in the transaction

A01.description: The manufacturer's works which delivers the certificate along the product

A02.description: The type of inspection document, e.g. 'EN 10204 3.1 Certificate'

A03.description: The document number of the certifcate

A04.description: The mark of the manufacturer as base64 png file. The maximum size is <TBD>

A05.description: The originator of the document, not necessarily equal to A01

A09.description: The article number used by the purchaser

A06.description: The purchaser of the product and receiver of the certificate

C70.description: The metallurgic process, which is restricted to 2 types: Y = Basic oxygen process, E = Electric furnace

D01.description: Marking and identification, surface appearance, shape and dimensional properties

C00.description: Heat or melt number defining the chemical properties

C32.description: The average value of the individual values measured

title: Certificate
